mapper.insert: insert into machine_relation() values(#{ip},#{realIp},#{updateTime},#{status},#{extraDesc}) on duplicate key update ip=#{ip},real_ip=#{realIp},update_time=#{updateTime},status=#{status},extra_desc=#{extraDesc}
mapper.update: update machine_relation set taskid = #{taskid}, is_sync= #{is_sync} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from machine_relation where ip = #{ip} and real_ip= #{real_ip} and is_sync in (0,-1)
mapper.update: update machine_relation set is_sync=#{is_sync},sync_time=now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from machine_relation where ip = #{ip} and real_ip= #{real_ip} and is_sync = #{is_sync}
